wikipedia_page.main: Griffith Caradoc Rees (13 April 1868 – 20 September 1924) was a Welsh lawyer, Liberal Party politician and later a judge.

response: The only candidate nominated to contest the by-election was the Liberal Caradoc Rees, who was therefore elected unopposed. Rees, who was a solicitor, held the seat until the constituency was abolished at the general election in December 1918 and was later appointed as a judge.
